title: .Gov Financial Application Redesign
description: Provided assistance in the selling and planning of a comprehensive redesign effort for a legacy, nation/agency-wide financial application.

content.title: .Gov Financial Application Redesign
description: Provided assistance in the selling and planning of a comprehensive redesign effort for a legacy, nation/agency-wide financial application.

tabs.title: Analysis & Wireframing
description: Utilized downtime on the project to re-analyze past research/raw feedback from customer support sources. Provided UX minded categorization in order to better visualize and understand problem areas within the application as a whole. Created a UX analysis excel document to include all raw data and an interactive dashboard for filtering and viewing of analysis.

Elevated issues regarding Requirements/Development team contradictions and potential future roadblocks while also communicating the need for further UX assistance. Successfully argued for further UX analysis and recommended alternate feature prioritizations. Assisted in creating a UX minded sales deck that included: past requested/identified problem areas, newly found problems to be elevated, and potential project process and timeline.

tabs.title: Iteration
description: Created iterations of wireframes after discussing and collaborating with the Requirements and Development teams. Considerations such as timeline and technical feasibility guided wireframes to be transitional in new technical functionality. Fidelity was increased to account for new expectations/requests for it to be included in a sales deck.

tabs.title: Sales & Strategy
description: Utilized downtime on the project to re-analyze past research/raw feedback from customer support sources. Provided UX minded categorization in order to better visualize and understand problem areas within the application as a whole. Created a UX analysis excel document to include all raw data and an interactive dashboard for filtering and viewing of analysis.

Elevated issues regarding Requirements/Development team contradictions and potential future roadblocks while also communicating the need for further UX assistance. Successfully argued for further UX analysis and recommended alternate feature prioritizations. Assisted in creating a UX minded sales deck that included: past requested/identified problem areas, newly found problems to be elevated, and potential project process and timeline.

title: ProptIn Application
description: Developed a POC for an internal project intended to compliment the proposal creation process.

content.title: ProptIn Application
description: Utilized Angular, Webpack, and Sass for a MAMP application for searching and creating user profiles regarding proposal team creation. Provided features for both online/offline favoriting, searching, and viewing/creating profiles.
Utilized user tests to validate and improve features. Successfully presented and received approval for further development.

title: Fundbox Partners Plugin
description: Developed a POC to enable Fundbox products within third-party websites and exchanges.

content.title: Fundbox Partners Plugin
description: Developed a POC to enable Fundbox products within third-party websites and exchanges such as: Intuit and NerdWallet. Utilized HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and Python to provide a cross-origin solution for whitelisted partners and third parties.

title: Personal Project
description: Designed to provide an online space to create custom 2x2 matrices whether in the design, development, or project planning phases.

content.title: Personal Project
description: Inspired by infographics displayed on HQ televisions and monitors, this personal project intended to create an online 2x2 application to help facilitate discussion and information awareness.

tabs.title: Wireframing
description: Created wireframes for an MVP to test data input, customization, and scannability. Created versions for Television, Desktop, and Tablet formats.

tabs.title: Prototyping
description: Iterated over wireframes after consulting use cases from DesignerNews.co and Medium.com. Utilized InVision to create a prototype for initial feedback gathering. Planned phase 2 deliverables to include: CSV export and shareable link creation.

tabs.title: User Testing
description: Created assets for potential user feedback sessions. Included script, prompt, and alternate versions depending on roles such as PM or generic user.

title: Mock Zacks.com Redesign
description: A mock redesign of the Zacks.com mobile application. Motivated by the lack of tablet specific design and personal interest in seeing an updated interface.

content.title: Mock Zacks.com Redesign
description: A mock redesign of the Zacks.com mobile application. Motivated by the lack of tablet specific design and personal interest in seeing an updated interface.

tabs.title: Heuristic & Competitive Analysis
description: Conducted a heuristic analysis of the Zacks.com mobile application while also reviewing competitor standards.

tabs.title: Wireframing
description: Created wireframes for the mobile application with considerations made to navigation, spacing, readability, and scannability. Created a GIF presentation through Keynote to help visualize the gestures and general feel of the application.

tabs.title: A/B Testing
description: Created potential A/B testing material. Alternatives included (1) search order by volume or ticker name and (2) the order of displaying relevant information.
